revised_title: A Comprehensive Discussion on the Physiology and Biochemistry of Lactation
tldr: This article discusses the physiology and biochemistry of lactation, covering topics such as hormonal control, mammary gland growth, milk secretion, and milk fat synthesis. It highlights the importance of understanding these processes for the survival of mammals and the development of hormone-enzyme relationships. The article also emphasizes the interaction of neural and endocrine factors in controlling the mammary gland and the coordination of milk secretion and removal.
